title: Trump news at a glance: president shrugs off ill health rumours as ‘fake news’
summary: Donald Trump stated he was "very active over the weekend" while responding to speculation regarding his health, asserting there is nothing wrong with him. title: Labor is poised to make a big call on our nation’s carbon emissions target. But who is Albanese going to listen to?  | Clear Air
summary: Australia's target for reducing emissions by 2035 will serve as a key indicator of its commitment to tackling the climate crisis. This target is expected to be a significant benchmark for evaluating the nation's environmental policies and actions. title: US House committee releases batch of Epstein records as White House fights release of all files – as it happened
summary: A Republican-led oversight committee has released more than 33,000 pages of documents as part of their investigation into a deceased sex offender. The files are intended to provide insight into the circumstances surrounding the individual's offenses. The release underscores ongoing scrutiny and accountability related to the case.
